articles.author: Patrick Andres
articles.title: Bills-Chiefs Smashes AFC Championship Ratings Record With Monster TV Audience - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Kansas City's quest for a three-peat has captivated, infuriated and inspired Americans.
articles.content:
Love or hate the Kansas City Chiefs, they remain preposterously compelling television.
The Chiefs' 3229 win over the Buffalo Bills in Sunday's AFC championship drew an audience of 57.4 million viewe… [+1200 chars]
